title: Ghost Horse
description: '...They had many names for him - this stallion of the Pacific North-West. The mustangers called him Pahute because he was said to have been born on a mountain mesa of the same name. Others called him "The Ghost".'Jim Blaine's search for the legendary stallion is told by Joseph Chipperfield in this exciting Western story for older readers.
author: Joseph E. Chipperfield
